name: Just Golf
description:
I'm in a hurry...

Being an impatient player for a sport that would normally require lots of patience, you just can't wait for the golf ball to come to a stop. Put and hit the ball as fast as possible to the goal before it slows down too much!

Controls W/A/S/DMove your characterLeft Mouse ButtonCharge a shot by holding down; release to hit the ball
ShiftSprintMouse WheelSwap between Driver (Strong, low accuracy) and Putter (Weak, perfect accuracy)QRestart levelRReset to last checkpoint

Just Golf is a 2d golf "simulation" created for the Mini-Jam 86, adhering the theme "No stopping"!
